nodes.text: The pacification of Bryndar was an event in the history of the Galactic Empire. This event was covered in the Strategy and Tactics class taught by Colonel Julyan at the Arkanis Academy. While attending the class, Zare Leonis got caught up in the thrill of Julyan's rapid-fire narration. He had to remind himself of his true purpose for being at the academy: to rescue his sister Dhara, not, as he thought, "to learn how the pacification of Bryndar could have gone differently."

The pacification of Bryndar is mentioned in passing in Jason Fry's 2015 canon novel Servants of the Empire: The Secret Academy. While in the continuity of Star Wars Legends, Bryndar was a planet, no details are provided in The Secret Academy.
